channel.title: 小石头博客
channel.description: Recent content on 小石头博客

item.title: Hugo
item.description:
HUGO

官网地址

hugo 是由 go 语言开发的一款博客工具，可以生成静态网页，效率高部署简单。

部署

windows 环境部署

1.下载安装

github 地址

1.1 安装指定版本

安装版本 0.136.5

1.2 解压并设置环境变量

1.3 测试

1
2
3

PS D:\hugo\MyFreshWebsite> hugo version
hugo v0.136.5-46cccb021bc6425455f4eec093f5cc4a32f1d12c windows/amd64 BuildDate=2024-10-24T12:26:27Z VendorInfo=gohugoio
PS D:\hugo\MyFreshWebsite>

2.创建网站

1
2

# MyFreshWebsite自定义的文件名称   --format yaml采用yaml文件作为配置文件
 hugo new site MyFreshWebsite --format yaml

3.主题配置

官网地址

3.1 下载主题

1
2

#也可以采用下载本地解压到创建网站的主题目录
git clone https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod themes/PaperMod --depth=1

3.2 配置文件设置

baseURL: "https://examplesite.com/"
title: "小石头博客"
pagination:
  pagerSize: 5
theme: hugo-PaperMod

enableRobotsTXT: true
buildDrafts: false
buildFuture: false
buildExpired: false

googleAnalytics: UA-123-45

minify:
  disableXML: true
  minifyOutput: true

params:
  env: production # to enable google analytics, opengraph, twitter-cards and schema.
  title: ExampleSite
  description: "ExampleSite description"
  keywords: [Blog, Portfolio, PaperMod]
  author: Me
  # author: ["Me", "You"] # multiple authors
  images: ["<link or path of image for opengraph, twitter-cards>"]
  DateFormat: "January 2, 2006"
  defaultTheme: auto # dark, light
  disableThemeToggle: false #控制界面上黑白转换的图标
  DateFormat: "2006-01-02" # 日期格式化
  # 解决hugov0.124版本中移除的.Site.Social属性配置
  social:
    twitter: "https://twitter.com/yourusername"
    github: "https://github.com/yourusername"
  ShowReadingTime: true
  ShowShareButtons: false #关闭文章下边的一些链接图标
  ShowPostNavLinks: true
  ShowBreadCrumbs: true #开启面包屑导航
  ShowCodeCopyButtons: true
  ShowWordCount: true
  ShowRssButtonInSectionTermList: true
  UseHugoToc: true
  disableSpecial1stPost: false
  disableScrollToTop: false
  comments: false
  hidemeta: false
  hideSummary: false
  showtoc: true #显示目录
  tocopen: true # 自动展开目录
  ShowLastMod: true # 显示文章最后修改日期

  # assets:
  #   # disableHLJS: true # to disable highlight.js
  #   # disableFingerprinting: true
  #   favicon: "<link / abs url>"
  #   favicon16x16: "<link / abs url>"
  #   favicon32x32: "<link / abs url>"
  #   apple_touch_icon: "<link / abs url>"
  #   safari_pinned_tab: "<link / abs url>"

  label:
    text: "Home"
    icon: /apple-touch-icon.png
    iconHeight: 35

  # profile-mode
  profileMode:
    enabled: false # needs to be explicitly set
    title: 小石头博客
    subtitle: "This is subtitle"
    imageUrl: "<img location>"
    imageWidth: 120
    imageHeight: 120
    imageTitle: my image
    buttons:
      - name: Archive
        url: "/archive"
      - name: Github
        url: "https://github.com/"

  # home-info mode 主页配置
  homeInfoParams:
    Title: "小石头博客 \U0001F44B"
    Content: Welcome to my blog

  socialIcons:
    - name: stackoverflow
      url: "https://stackoverflow.com"
    - name: github
      url: "https://github.com/"


 # 背景图片覆盖设置，注释掉,可以图片显示出来
  #cover:
    #hidden: true # hide everywhere but not in structured data
    #hiddenInList: true # hide on list pages and home
    #hiddenInSingle: true # hide on single page
 # 配置文章的地址，在文章位置显示可以跳转到指定
  #editPost:
    #URL: "https://github.com/<path_to_repo>/content"
    #Text: "Suggest Changes" # edit text
    #appendFilePath: true # to append file path to Edit link

  # 搜索相关配置
  # https://fusejs.io/api/options.html
  fuseOpts:
    isCaseSensitive: false
    shouldSort: true
    location: 0
    distance: 1000
    threshold: 0.4
    minMatchCharLength: 0
    limit: 10 # refer: https://www.fusejs.io/api/methods.html#search
    # 根据那些关键字搜索
    keys: ["title", "permalink", "summary"]
menu:
  main:
    - identifier: search
      name: 🔍搜索
      url: search
      weight: 1
    - identifier: home
      name: 🏠主页
      url: /
      weight: 2
    - identifier: archives
      name: ⏱时间轴
      url: archives/
      weight: 20
    - identifier: tags
      name: 🔖标签
      url: tags
      weight: 40
# Read: https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod/wiki/FAQs#using-hugos-syntax-highlighter-chroma
pygmentsUseClasses: true
# markup块配置的是markdown样式配置
markup:
  highlight:
    noClasses: false
    # anchorLineNos: true
    codeFences: true # 代码围栏
    guessSyntax: true # 语法猜测
    lineNos: true #是否显示行号
    style: darcula
# 搜索相关配置，PaperMod使用Fuse.js用于搜索
outputs:
  home:
    - HTML
    - RSS
    - JSON

4.创建归档和搜索页面

4.1 创建搜索页面和存档文章
